trans-unit.target: REACH!<tab>FAIL!<tab>
You sense something larger than even a giant takitaro!<tab>You no longer sense anything out of the ordinary.<tab>The presence looms large once more!
You sense something massive just below the surface!<tab>You no longer sense anything out of the ordinary.<tab>The mysterious mass returns!
The water falls dark...<tab>A faint glow returns to the water.<tab>Again the water darkens!
A golden figure lurks near the surface!<tab>The golden figure has retreated to the murky depths.<tab>The golden figure rises once more!
Something large has risen from the depths to feed!<tab>You no longer sense anything out of the ordinary.<tab>The large predator hungers once more!
You sense something even more terrible than Canavan in the waters before you!<tab>You no longer sense anything out of the ordinary.<tab>The terror strikes again!
You sense a new legend might be told this day...<tab>You no longer sense anything out of the ordinary.<tab>The legend continues!
It smells of a rat...<tab>The stench has abated.<tab>The reek intensifies!
You sense something deep beneath the magma...<tab>You no longer sense anything out of the ordinary.<tab>The magma swells once more!
Something glimmers near the riverbed...<tab>You no longer perceive anything out of the ordinary.<tab>The riverbed glimmers once more!
You sense the lord of these skies has returned...<tab>You no longer sense anything out of the ordinary.<tab>Again, you sense a humbling presence...
Lady Luck has sidled up beside you...<tab>The good lady has departed.<tab>It seems Lady Luck has given you another chance!
Something wondrous this way comes...<tab>You no longer sense anything out of the ordinary.<tab>Something wondrous wends its way back!
The lake begins to radiate all the colors of the rainbow!<tab>The glow fades...<tab>The rainbow returns!
The stones beneath the water begin shifting hither and thither.<tab>The stones are stationary once again.<tab>The stones clatter back to life!
A massive shadow slides across the loch floor.<tab>The shadow is no more.<tab>Again the shadow looms!
You see the flickering light of eyes beneath the waters.<tab>The flickering light fades...<tab>The light flickers back to life!
You sense eyes staring up at you from the sandy waters...<tab>You no longer sense anything out of the ordinary.<tab>The eyes gaze at you once more!
A glimmering jade figure drifts beneath the waters.<tab>The glimmer fades into the depths.<tab>The glimmering jade figure drifts back to the surface!
A large shadow dances along the loch floor.<tab>The shadow is no more.<tab>The shadow dances back into view!
The visage of a gormless-looking Roegadyn stares at you from beneath the waters.<tab>The face vanishes back into the depths.<tab>The Roegadyn faces you once more!
The ocean begins to twinkle like the stars in the sky.<tab>The twinkle fades to nothing.<tab>Again the ocean twinkles!
A shadow evoking the Lord of the Whorl slithers across the ocean.<tab>The shadow has disappeared.<tab>The shadow slithers back across your field of vision!
The coral begins to wriggle about on the ocean floor.<tab>The wriggling stops.<tab>The wriggling begins once again.
You see a metallic glint just beneath the waters.<tab>The glint vanishes.<tab>You catch sight of the glint once more.
A massive boulder begins to writhe on the ocean floor.<tab>The boulder ceases to move.<tab>The boulder begins to writhe again.
You spot a glimmer of crimson, as if a ruby has floated to the surface of the ocean.<tab>All hint of crimson vanishes.<tab>The glimmer of crimson flashes into view once more.
The shadow lurking under the surface belongs to a beast spoken of only in legend.<tab>The shadow is no more.<tab>The shadow emerges from the depths once again.
An aura of violent menace rises from the depths!<tab>The sense of menace dissipates.<tab>The aura of violent menace returns!
You glimpse the writhing silhouette of some vast tentacle moving just beneath the water.<tab>The undulating shadow has withdrawn.<tab>You sense the undulating shadow once again.
You glance down into a pair of astoundingly goblin-like eyes.<tab>You no longer feel the weight of that goblin-like gaze.<tab>You feel that goblin-like glaze boring into you again.
You rub your eyes, certain you'd seen a creature with no business being out on the ocean.<tab>The out-of-place creature has moved on...or never was.<tab>The out-of-place creature is back in place.
A graceful, leafy form appears, swirling and dancing beneath the waves.<tab>The leafy form has swept on out of sight.<tab>The leafy form swirls gracefully back into view.
A dull cracking and crunching sound echoes up from the sea floor.<tab>The crunching, cracking sounds fade into silence.<tab>The cracking and crunching sounds resound in your ears once again.
A reptilian tail writhes and splashes up to the surface!<tab>The splashing subsides.<tab>The splashing returns with renewed vigor!
The Font's aquatic flora undulates with sudden activity! <tab>The activity subsides...<tab>The aquatic flora undulates with activity anew!
A massive, ship-shaped silhouette darkens the waters before you.<tab>The shadowy silhouette returns to the depths.<tab>The waters are once again darkened with the ship-shaped silhouette.
A layer of ice suddenly forms upon the lake's surface!<tab>The frozen surface thaws.<tab>The lake's surface begins to freeze once again!
A profound melancholy swells within you!<tab>The melancholy passes as swiftly as it came...<tab>You are seized by melancholy once more!
A large fin breaches the ocean surface!<tab>The fin sinks under the surface and out of sight...<tab>The fin breaches the water's surface again!
A lethal predator draws close to the ship!<tab>The predator loses interest...<tab>The lethal predator draws close with renewed interest!
A strip of red and white floats under the water's surface!<tab>You lose sight of the colorful fish...<tab>You catch sight of the colorful fish again!
Something blue glitters deep under the water!<tab>The glittering vanishes...<tab>The glittering blue form reappears!
You feel hungry eyes track your every move!<tab>The hungry thing decides to feast elsewhere...<tab>The hungry thing returns!
The sea temperature rises suddenly!<tab>The temperature of the water returns to normal...<tab>The sea temperature begins to rise again!
The seaweed glimmers with a strange light!<tab>The seaweed glimmers no more...<tab>The seaweed glimmers anew!
The scent of plums rises from the waters!<tab>The scent of plums disappears...<tab>The scent of plums wafts forth again!
You spot a massive shadow drifting along beneath the clouds.<tab>The shadow is no more.<tab>The looming shadow appears beneath the clouds once again.
You glimpse the blurred form of some flying creature as it flashes across the sky.<tab>Like a living bolt of lightning, the creature flickers past and is gone.<tab>
Something glints white beneath the water!<tab>The glint was all too fleeting...<tab>The glinting white form reappears!
You glimpse a draconic form writhe up from the depths!<tab>The draconic figure fades from view...<tab>The draconic form looms forth once again!
